title: AC Filters
description: Remove filters, wash with water, spray AC with fungal spray

title: Bathroom
description: Clean toilet, sink, shower, and floor

title: Kitchen
description: Wipe counters, clean stove, mop floor

title: Refrigerator
description: Remove all items, clean shelves, wipe interior

title: Vacuum
description: Vacuum all carpets and rugs in the house

title: Floor
description: Sweep and mop all hard floors

title: Windows
description: Clean interior and exterior of all windows

title: Dishwasher
description: Clean filter and run empty cycle with cleaner

title: Washing Machine
description: Run cleaning cycle with washing machine cleaner

title: Dryer
description: Clean lint trap thoroughly and vacuum vent

title: Shower Doors
description: Clean glass with shower cleaner to prevent buildup

title: Ceiling Fans
description: Dust blades and clean light fixtures

title: Air Purifier
description: Replace or clean filter according to manual
